attributes.action: Allow Ukrainians visa free entry to the UK. Provide a safe route to travel here
attributes.additional_details: Empty words of the politicians need to be backed up by immediate concrete action that will provide meaningful help in this time of crisis.
attributes.background: Change the bureaucratic rules requiring visas for entry in this time of emergency to allow immediate entry. Provide humanitarian support by allowing all Ukrainians who wish to do so to find safety and rebuild their lives in the UK.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Waive visa requirement for Ukrainian refugees: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609530

Offer fast track asylum to any Ukrainians displaced due to the invasion: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609382
